extendedInfo.description: New HIT from the makers of "Pobs"!You have a ball, some lines and a number of shots to hit these lines. Do you think it's so easy? Hell no! Try it and you'll see! Use minimal number of shots to destroy all lines on a level. And try not to hit the red nodes - they are evil! - Very addictive! - Great re-playability! - For kids and adults! - Global high-scores (Scoreloop)This is a gameplay prototype of game "Recoil" (and "Recoil Free"), which is available in Market.Additional:Internet, Network State and other permissions are needed only for online high-score features and some ads (not annoying), so please don't worry about this.Wanna download mp3 music track? - NO! Just play this awesome game!This is like Doodle Jump, Toss Paper or Fruit Ninja! It's so addictive!From the makers of another great game Pobs (~100 000 downloads!):https://market.android.com/details?id=com.chipsteam.pobs----------IMPORTANT:We recommend to download a new, more better version of this game, which is called "Recoil", check out in Market!Many âHITâ bugs and issues are fixed in Recoil and Recoil Free. Hereâs an improvements list:- Small and large screens compatibility- 2 crashes related with menu button fixed- Random crash during the game fixed- Global and local leaderboards improved- New Scoreloop services and social features integrated- Heyzap social service integrated- Game and difficulty balances improved- New color backgrounds every launch!- Many small improvements- Minor bugs fixedDownload better version of HIT - Recoil or Recoil Free!Recoil Free:https://market.android.com/details?id=com.chipsteam.recoilfreeRecoil Premium:https://market.android.com/details?id=com.chipsteam.recoil
